news.title: Sounion attack brings Red Sea shipping crisis back to fore

impact_description: The attack caused disruptions and uncertainty in the Red Sea shipping routes, potentially affecting ports like Port Sudan, Jeddah Islamic Port, Massawa Port, and Aqaba due to increased security concerns and potential rerouting of vessels.

news.title: Maersk faces acute port congestion in the Mediterranean & Asia causing vessel delays

impact_description: Port congestion in the Mediterranean and Asia caused significant vessel delays.  The specific ports affected are not listed but would include major container ports in both regions, leading to widespread delays and disruptions in shipping schedules.

news.title: Glitches in new terminal operating systems spark delays at South India ports

impact_description: Technical glitches in new terminal operating systems caused delays at several South Indian ports, including Chennai, Tuticorin and Cochin, impacting cargo handling and vessel schedules.
